title: Boris Johnson refuses to answer questions about Jennifer Arcuri – video
text:
Boris Johnson refused to answer questions about Jennifer Arcuri who was awarded more than £126,000 of public money and given a highly sought after entrepreneur visa to stay in the UK after securing the prime minister’s endorsement for her firm. Questioned about his relationship with the US businesswoman, Johnson said: ‘I’ve said everything I’m going to say on that particular subject.’

In her first broadcast interview, Arcuri confirmed she had a ‘very close bond’ with Johnson and refused to rule out claims they had an affair
description: Boris Johnson refused to answer questions about the US businesswoman at the centre of a conflict of interest row
